name: nutrient supply from vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses | organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23725/documentation

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses'' for fertiliser use.;No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use. The purpose of this activity is to connect the chemical production of ''vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses'' with its generic uses as fertilizer. The product ''vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses'' is connected to the generic market for 'organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' and 'organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5' and 'organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' through this supplying activity. In the agricultural context, ''vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses'' can be used directly as a fertilizer input to crop production, eventually with other chemicals; alternatively, a generic input of 'organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' and 'organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5' and 'organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' can be used instead, and this will represent the regional consumption mix for his type of nutrient. A way in between is allowed by using the generic input 'organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' and 'organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5' and 'organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' and link to the activity providing it from a specific chemical.;In all cases, emissions associated to the application of the fertilizer have to be calculated in the crop production activity.

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses'' for fertiliser use.

No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Inventory based on composition of ''vinasse, from fermentation of sugar beet molasses''.

exchanges.description: Assumed same composition as ethanol from sugar beet vinasse http://www.kws.de/aw/archivierte_Reste/zuckerruebe/bioethanol/Themen_Bioethanol/~ckdc/Vinasse_8211_ein_interessantes_Nebenprodukt original values given in % based on fresh mass. Dry mass = 68%
